Text: Thank you. Well done.  i always buy Card's books but I like to have the electronic copy for my tablet as well.  You are a good person.

Not only did Card say he doesn't mind his books being pirated (I guess he just assumes the money will come in just by getting his name out), but his anti-gay marriage stance makes me more than willing to oblige in sharing.
thanks a lot. do you know where i can find human division? i can only find the audio, and prefer text.cheers mate.
